comments.content:
I really can’t believe how quickly I receive a reply on this site. It’s a brilliant resource, it really is.

Thank you Pieter.

R.
Sadly, you will may also not believe how _slowly_ you receive a reply from The Foundry.

What do you mean Stephen?

Are they slow dealing with orders?

Do they actually _deal_ with orders? That would be a first. :^D :^P

Their reaction time varies from glacially slow to non-existent.
Let us know how it goes. I do hope you get a reply. Otherwise, [alternatives to Gridnik](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304025215/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/type/discuss/72157594411132298/).
